TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Singsiya, title = Singsiya, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Singsiya} }

S.FORM: Singsiya Itiniay i Hualien Cen no Hualien ko Singsiya a niyaro', 725 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 2,092 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 16% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 345 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 84% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,747 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis13%, Tayal1%, Truku1%.

Singsiya Itiniay i Hoalien Cen no Hoalien ko Singsiya a niyaro', 725 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 2,092 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 16% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 345 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 84% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,747 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis13%, Tayal1%, Troko1%.
